evidence.claim: The company utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure, ensuring scalable and secure services.
Haled supports FHIR standards for healthcare data exchange.
Integration with X12 for EDI transactions, specifically 270 and 271 transaction sets.
Describes data handling with HL7 protocols for interoperability in health systems.

icp.icp_reason: Uses X12 standards and is focused on healthcare data exchange.
